sentence.Network_en: It required a statesman's foresight and sagacity to make the decision.

sentence.Network_en: Sagacity, unlike cleverness, usually increases with age.
sentence.Network_cn: 明智和聪明不同, 通常是随着年龄增长的.

sentence.Network_en: I hesitate to record the many other instances of his sagacity.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不大愿意把关于他如何聪明的其他许多事例写下来.
